website_summaries.verdict: In only two weeks, notice the difference in wrinkles and age spots.
cons: Some customers commented that this serum stung their eyes when applying

customer_reviews.title: Works so so
customer_reviews.text: It is a good eye cream, but as with all of them I do not see a drastic improvement around the eye area. It's a good eye care treatment, but maybe better ones available.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great for your Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I was told about this product by my best friend. I had dark circles, puffy eyes and really dry skin.. I started using this and about a week later I noticed a different. It was not a dramatic difference but my eyes look better. Hopefully as I keep using this cream the better my eyes will be. It gives your skin a moisture feel and takes away the tightness that goes with dry skin. I will deffently be buying this on an ongoing basis.
customer_reviews.author: osofast2

customer_reviews.title: Great eye cream
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for a while now. It's a good eye cream. doesn't bother your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Paris A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't notice any difference
customer_reviews.text: I bought this eye cream because I always hear good things about this brand but honestly I used it all and I don't feel like buying it again. I didn't see any difference on my skin during the whole process.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Stroup

customer_reviews.title: Splendid Eyes Cream
customer_reviews.text: December 17, 2019 Having applied the Clinique eyes cream, I find that it smoothed out the wrinkles and seems to diminish them a bit around the eyes. It doesn't get completely rid of my puffiness or dark circles, but I've seen a great improvement for everyday use. Luisa E.
customer_reviews.author: Uzi E.

customer_reviews.title: Use this~!
customer_reviews.text: I don't live close to a Mall, so I buy ALMOST EVERYTHING I NEED off Amazon. I always check prices and compare. 99% of the time, I get the best deal on Amazon. This eye cream is great. I use after all my other makeup has been applied to diminish wrinkles around the eyes. Little goes along way.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: I recommend a different eye cream its only good for moister.
customer_reviews.text: First thing I ever purchased out of love nd didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Farhana syed

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Love to use this under eye treatment. Seems to plump up the under eye area enough to smooth out the wrinkles. Doesn't help much with black circles, but the wrinkles seem to diminish a bit. Feels silky but stays kind of greasy on the eyes. I only use at night.
customer_reviews.author: Gigglingrizz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The skin around my eyes is softer and smoother. Great base for makeup too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: soooo good!
customer_reviews.text: its the best cream for eyes i have ever used! leaves my eyes feeling very hydrated all day long. super
customer_reviews.author: victoria nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I have tried many creams, gels, and sticks that swear they get rid of puffiness under the eyes. This one is a pretty good. It doesn't really get rid of the puffiness, but does lessen it and really softens the skin, as well as the fine lines under and around the eyes more than most. It's the best I've found so far that is affordable.
customer_reviews.author: P. Regalado

customer_reviews.title: Miracle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eye cream, it tames my bed eyes every day. Not greasy, just soothing and soft on your puffy eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Life.is.Gr8

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: this product feels great/ no irritation/ great absorption and very fast, can apply make up 2 minutes later/ light/ love Clinique product/ good results
customer_reviews.author: Marina Kogan

customer_reviews.title: This product did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this clinique product for a while, but I was disappointment. It did not help me with any of my Wrinkles or dark circles. Do not waist your money :-(
customer_reviews.author: A.Alberto.P

customer_reviews.title: For a oyung face
customer_reviews.text: I habee used Clinique years ago and this is a wonderful product for eyes, is fresh and not oily. Regards
customer_reviews.author: Monicap75

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This eye cream is excellent & gets rid of the dry skin patches above my eyes. I use a base product for my dark circles then apply this on top. Keeps my eyes moisturized plus it helps my eye makeup last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Suzzieqgw

customer_reviews.title: Great for your eyes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for people who have dark circles. It feels greasy and thick and moisturizes and hydrates like no other.
customer_reviews.author: Mariely

customer_reviews.title: It fits me
customer_reviews.text: I think it is good and it fits me. After I use it, I feel very cool in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Hu

customer_reviews.title: just good not the best "for me"
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the reviews and I was very confident that it would be great for my awful dark circles but unfortunately it didn't work for me. I've been use it for more than three weeks now 2x/day but nothing changed !! The good news is that it really hydrate your eyes and gives you that kind of humidity and refresh.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: A miracle for my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I'm very allergic and had not found anything that was so great for my eyes
customer_reviews.author: Pilot

customer_reviews.title: I like them very much
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this eye cream for a long time. I also use many clinique products. I like them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Branco

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The cream felt greasy on my face and made me get acne.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: didn't like it at all
customer_reviews.text: after once use, the skin area around my eyes where i had applied it started to burn and become very irritated. so never used it again. just be careful if you have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Factory second
customer_reviews.text: This is a factory second. The label was misprinted on the jar. I am hoping that the contents are fine.
customer_reviews.author: mary l. carlin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small for the price that you pay but I hope it works
customer_reviews.author: KAREN GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy !
customer_reviews.text: This came in a ziplock without the original clinique box. The bottle had no seal either Doubt it is an original !!!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Seller did everything OK. Shame on Clinique.
customer_reviews.text: Not the sellers fault but a total rip off. It was like a sample size.. ridiculous..
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: It's the best, although expensive
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive, but I don't use it all the time. I use other products to make my dollars go farther. It is thick, rich, and does not burn or sting the eyes if you get it in them. Only time will tell as I age as to whether my eyes will still continue to look youthful.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Canner

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it morning and night, and really don't notice much of a difference.
customer_reviews.author: ztricia

customer_reviews.title: ... used this for several months now and I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for several months now and I'm very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: charlotte

customer_reviews.title: very thick and moisturizing eye cream
customer_reviews.text: very nourishing and works all day! i love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Love CLINIQUE products!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, have been using it now for several years! I love CLINIQUE products😊
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: I have always used Clinique products and love them. It's great for your skin
customer_reviews.text: I have always used Clinique products and love them. It's great for your skin. I always get compliments on my skin. I used the entire cleaning products. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Brendia Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Under eye makeup
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for the past 4 years. It is very helpful to use under cover-up or as I call it, concealer when you are over 30.
customer_reviews.author: R. Desandres

customer_reviews.title: And I always have a great experience!
customer_reviews.text: It was deliver on time . And I always have a great experience !
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be good stuff. Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: the best I have tried
customer_reviews.text: I needed an eye cream for my very dry and sensitive skin and after trying many brands, this was the one. It is great under makeup and I also wear it at night. It is worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: L. Leboreiro

customer_reviews.title: Not a big deal...
customer_reviews.text: This product did nothing for me. I have dark circles around my eyes, and it didn't change a thing. Maybe it works as a moisturizer, but it didn't vanish my dark circles.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clinique is a brand that every women looking to be "Beautifully Beautiful" should try~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: really works!
customer_reviews.text: I have bad dark circles due to insomnia and being aminic. I been using this so a few weeks now the first time I used it I noticed a big diffrence it brighten my dark circles up and over time I noticed them slowly going away
customer_reviews.author: tigerrawr

customer_reviews.title: It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. I use it before going to sleep . Didn't see results at 2 months or later.
customer_reviews.author: Zermina Ejaz

customer_reviews.title: Used?
customer_reviews.text: I was really upset to receive this it was in no box and no seal was on it I will not use it because it does not have a seal.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: I am very upset with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset with my purchase (Clinique cream "All about eyes rich" and Clinique "Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel") which I've bought from Laptop-Services in April 2011. The both (cream and gel) I've got unpacked. I think Laptop-Services must pay more attention how the treatments they send to customers are packed! Unfortunately I am not happy with my purchase; I think I'll never buy treatments using Laptop-Services.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

product_meta.title: Clinique All About Rich Eyes Makeup, 0.5 Ounce
product_meta.description: Moisture-rich eye cream diminishes the look of undereye circles, shadows, fine lines-instantly and over time. De-puffs, calms with botanicals. Helps boost natural collagen production. Strengthens skin's moisture barrier against common irritants. Ophthalmologist Tested.
feature_bullets: Clinique All about Eyes Rich 0.5 oz (all Skin Types)

specifications.Manufacturer: Camrose Trading Inc. DBA Fragrance Express - DROPSHIP
